column4: Hi, the mouse scroll section of the mouse pad isnt working. How can I check that this module is loaded?
I'm assuming you're not talking about the trackpad on your laptop?
yeah
Last week it was working now its now
have you updated your kernel in that time? rebooted your computer? is the module psmouse loaded? what does the output of `lsmod` look like?
kernel update yeah, let me see..
psmouse                40336  0
I presume it must be loaded from somewhere
try doing sudo rmmod psmouse && sudo modprobe psmouse
now wait.. the pad works, its just the scroll
i know, thought that might help ;)
let me explain what happened...

I run this OS on the fly and I thought I could load this on another computer. X however didnt load, and I presume xorg.conf got backed up or changed. Anyhow I gave up loading Ubuntu on that PC so I just went back to my laptop and X did not load. I had to manually get an xorg.conf backup file and restore it myself
Once I got X to load up again, the scroll bar just didnt work.
mind putting your xorg.conf up on paste.ubuntu.com so I can take a look?
yeth thir
http://paste.ubuntu.com/673309/
back
I cant seem to understand why the mousepad works but not the scroll bar
hi you there?
were you able to figure anything out on the paste?
You there
you there?
